FlowTrack for Windows
=====================

1. Install Python 3.10+ from https://python.org/downloads
   IMPORTANT: Check "Add Python to PATH" during installation!

2. Double-click start.bat

That's it! FlowTrack will install dependencies on first run,
then start tracking. A carrot icon appears in your system tray.

Click the icon > Dashboard to open the web UI.

Dashboard: http://localhost:5555
